column4: i have installed postfix, so everyname goes in /var/mail/username , i use mail command to read it, how can i read it from another computer with like a pop/imap server?
is there any good alternative to exchange?
can i talk to you in private
I don't think so, lots of people are whining about it :p
i have an active directory (AD) and an exchange 2000
i need an unklimited mail server
yeah, I don't think there's a *nix alternative for it
it's something lots of people whine about
i found zimbra community, kolab, scalix...... u know?
